main event: Reports of six unidentified flying objects were observed in the Norfolk, Virginia area on September 8, 1959, showing burning trails and moving generally westward.
interesting points: Witnesses described the objects as having a predominant color of green or blue-green., Observations lasted approximately 30 seconds each., The objects were reported to have tails resembling fire or exhaust., Witnesses included both civilians and military personnel., Similar sightings were reported around the same time by other agencies.
sighted object: six unidentified flying objects with tails
witness description: Civilians and military personnel in the area
